ProductInfo.Features:
GW9716LGH-F: Professional 16 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Real-time DVR with HDMI & VGA. Support CDRW/DVD-RW. 960×480 & 30FPS recording. iPhone, Android Viewing. New color graphical menu. Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
GW509: 1/3" SONY CCD Camera, 600TV Line, 9~22 mm lens, Super Low 0.0 Lux, Infrared LED 24 Pcs, Projected Distance Up To 196 Feet, Water proof & vandal proof
GW108M: Professional 1/3" Effio CCD Indoor Camera. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm lens, 36pcs IR LED, 98 ft. IR Distance. Vandal proof. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu
Package Includes: GW9716LGH-F DVR with 4TB HD; GWLED19IN - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor; 4 x GW509 - 1/3" SONY CCD Camera; 12 x GW108M - 1/3" Effio CCD Camera
1 x GW500RG59: 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable; GW1218-10A: 1 x 18 ports power box; 16 x Power pigtail (GW082); 16 x Power pigtail (GW132); 32 x GW10009: Twist On BNC Male Connector
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 16CHE4 Vari-Focal Lens Security Camera System with Monitor (White/Black)
